resources.string: Members of university administration (e.g., department chairs, deans, vice presidents, presidents, and librarians) are often also faculty members, in many cases beginning (and remaining) as professors. In some universities, the distinction between \'academic faculty\' and \'administrative faculty\' is made explicit by the former being contracted for nine months per year, meaning that they can devote their time to research (and possibly be absent from the campus) during the summer months, while the latter are contracted for twelve months per year. These two types of faculty status are sometimes known as \'nine-month faculty\' and \'twelve-month faculty\'. Faculty who are paid a nine-month salary are typically allowed to seek external funds from grant agencies to partially or fully support their research activities during the summer months.
IIIT Kota is a joint venture of the Ministry of Human Resource Development, Government of India, Rajasthan Government with Industries in Public-Private Partnership model.

To create technical manpower for meeting the current and future demands of industry: To recognize education and research in close interactionwith industry with emphasis on the development of leadership qualities in the young menand women entering the portals of the Institute with sensitivity to social development andeye for opportunities for growth in the international perspective

To create a center for imparting technical education of international standards and conduct research at the cutting edge of technology to meet the current and future challenges of technological development.
B.E. (Hons) in Mechanical Engineering from REC (NIT) Srinagar and M.Tech. and Ph.D. from I.I.T., Kanpur.
Director, IIIT Kota (continuing) Director, NIT Jaipur (continuing) Director,NIT Jalandhar (continuing) Director, NIT Delhi Director, of NIT Hamirpur
Ph.D. from University of Southampton, UK M.E.(CSE) from IISc Bangalore B.E.(ECE) from JNV University, Jodhpur

IIIT Kota is offering the following programmes. 1. 4 year B. Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (CSE) with student strength of 60 (increased from 2015). 2. 4 year B. Tech. in Electronics and Communications Engineering (ECE) with student strength of 30.

The admissions to B Tech program (Computer Science and Engineering, Electronics and Communications Engineering) at the IIIT Kota will be through the process as announced by jeemain.nic.in . Since we receive many such queries related to admissions, you may find useful links given below. For complete details, please visit josaa.nic.in and MUST read BUSINESS RULES.\n\n
The classes for IIIT Kota are being held at MNIT Jaipur. Schedule of classes and examinations shall be as per the academic calendar of MNIT Jaipur for the academic calendar 2016-2017.

The students admitted to B.Tech. program (Computer Science and Engineering, Electronics and Communications Engineering) of IIIT Kota may be accommodated in the hostel premises of MNIT Jaipur as per the availability of hostel rooms.

MNIT hostel facility is available to students admitted to IIIT Kota. Rooms shall be alloted as per availability of the rooms. Hostel allotment shall be on “First Come First Served” basis and only after admission procedure has been completed and admission fee has been paid.

1. Hostel fee shall be accepted through Demand Draft only. Cash/Cheques shall NOT be accepted. 

2. Demand Draft should be in favour of "MNIT MESS COUNCIL" payable at Jaipur. 

3. For new students, hostel fee shall be Rs 33500/- (Rupees Thirty Three Thousand Five Hundred Only). 

4. For current students, hostel fee shall be Rs 23500/- (Rupees Twenty Three Thousand Five Hundred Only). 

5. Students are required to fill in a form (download here) , attach a recent passport size photograph and submit this along with DD in “Hostel Office, Hostel No. 1, MNIT Jaipur”. A copy of admission fee challan should should also be attached. 

6. Hostel fee shall be accepted only after admission has been secured and admission fee has been paid. 

7. Students are advised to keep a record of details of fee paid.
